headline: Johnson Controls (JCI): Evaluating Valuation in Light of New Maritime Safety Partnership with VIKING Life-Saving Equipment
summary: Johnson Controls International (JCI) has just announced a global partnership with VIKING Life-Saving Equipment, aimed at delivering coordinated fire safety services to the maritime and offshore industries. The collaboration positions JCI to strengthen its offerings and market reach in the safety sector. See our latest analysis for Johnson Controls International. While JCI’s big maritime partnership marks a strategic move, it follows a period of strong momentum. Shares have surged with a 37.5%...

headline: Ambassador Rich Verma, Chief Administrative Officer of Mastercard, and Joakim Weidemanis, Chief Executive Officer (CEO), of Johnson Controls Join The USISPF Board of Directors
summary: Washington, District Of Columbia, Oct. 23, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The US-India Strategic Partnership Forum (USISPF) is thrilled to welcome Ambassador Rich Verma, Chief Administrative Officer at Mastercard, and Joakim Weidemanis, the Chief Executive Officer (CEO) of Johnson Controls to the Board of Directors. headline: United Arab Emirates Smart Home Market Share Analysis, Growth Trends and Forecast to 2033 Featuring Johnson Controls, Schneider Electric, Emerson Electric, LG, Legrand, Siemens, Honeywell, Apple
summary: The United Arab Emirates Smart Home Market, projected to expand from US$ 654.45 million in 2024 to US$ 1.64 billion by 2033, is experiencing robust growth with a CAGR of 10.75%. This surge is driven by increasing disposable incomes and tech advancement in the country. Key market components include hardware, smart appliances, and AI speakers, finding applications in security, energy management, and home entertainment.
